cc.printtools

Class AwtForSinglePiecePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.printtools.AwtForSinglePiecePrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChineseCharacterTypePrinter

    public class AwtForSinglePiecePrinter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChineseCharacterTypePrinter
    物件活字單一列印工具。接收物件活字結構（PieceMovableType），並列印該活字在Graphics2D上。
